name: Float Like Dandi
description:
Hi all! This project was created by me and my two friends Gowtham and Austin as a submission for our first game jam with the theme 'Fly'.

You play as Dandi who's in search for places to propagate through the local plains and forests!

Please comment your suggestions and criticisms! We would love to hear back.

Thank you!

Assets:

SunnyLand Woods by ansimuz: SunnyLand Woods by ansimuz (itch.io)

4 Chiptunes (Adventure) by SubspaceAudio: https://opengameart.org/content/4-chiptunes-adventure

512 Sound Effects (8-bit style) by SubspaceAudio: https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style

Lillian font by jsr_Games : https://www.dafont.com/lilian-2.font

Credits:

Terence - Programmer, Artist ( using Unity, Aseprite)

Gowtham -  Programmer, Level Design (using Unity)

Austin - Programmer,  Level Design (using Unity)
